community_listings.title: Rhizome Community Page - Access Restricted
community_listings.description: Rhizome.org blocks AI bots in robots.txt (anthropic-ai, Claude-Web, ClaudeBot). Manual data collection or API access required.

community_listings.title: Alternative: Rhizome RSS Feed
community_listings.description: Consider using RSS feeds if available for automated updates

community_listings.title: Rhizome Commissions
community_listings.description: Known program: Annual artist commissions for technology and digital media work

community_listings.title: ArtBase Archive
community_listings.description: Digital art archive with 2000+ works from 1980s to present

community_listings.title: Net Art Anthology
community_listings.description: Curated collection of 100 significant net art works

community_listings.title: Seven on Seven Conference
community_listings.description: Annual conference pairing artists with technologists

community_listings.title: Rhizome Editorial
community_listings.description: Critical writing on digital culture, net art, and technology

restriction_reason: robots.txt explicitly disallows AI bots (anthropic-ai, Claude-Web, ClaudeBot, etc.)
cloudflare_protection: Site also uses Cloudflare bot protection requiring JavaScript
note: Automated scraping is blocked by both robots.txt policy and Cloudflare protection. Consider: (1) Manual data entry, (2) RSS feeds if available, (3) Official API if exists, (4) User-provided data updates.
recommendations: Check for RSS feeds at https://rhizome.org/feed/ or similar
Consider manual periodic updates to community listings
